subject: Tennis
Wages and Salaries
Australian Open (Tennis)
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The ATP Player Council, with Roger Federer as its president, is pushing for more prize money at Grand Slam tournaments in an attempt to address an earning gap in a top-heavy sport.
snippet: The ATP Player Council, with Roger Federer as its president, is pushing for more prize money at Grand Slam tournaments in an attempt to address an earning gap in a top-heavy sport.
